metadata.description: Enter API Token of your BitSight account
Enter Azure Client Id that you have created during app registration
Enter Azure Client Secret that you have created during creating the client secret
Enter Azure Tenant Id of your Microsoft Entra ID
Enter Object id of your Microsoft Entra App
Please add valid company names separated by asterisk(*). For example: Actors Films*Goliath Investments LLC*HCL Group*Saperix, Inc.
The location in which the data collection rules and data collection endpoints should be deployed.
Log analytics workspace name. Can be found under Log analytics "Settings".
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Select log level or log severity value from DEBUG, INFO, ERROR. By default it is set to INFO.
Please enter a valid Quartz cron-expression. (Example: 0 0 * * * *)
Please enter a valid Quartz cron-expression. (Example: 0 */30 * * * *)

Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'

properties.description: Data collection endpoint for ingestion api

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_permissions = parse_json(permissions)
| extend permissions_can_download_company_report = tobool(json_permissions.can_download_company_report), permissions_can_enable_vendor_access = tobool(json_permissions.can_enable_vendor_access), permissions_can_unsubscribe = tobool(json_permissions.can_unsubscribe), permissions_can_view_company_reports = tobool(json_permissions.can_view_company_reports), permissions_can_view_service_providers = tobool(json_permissions.can_view_service_providers)
| extend parsed_type = type
| project-away json_permissions, permissions, type

source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_remediation_history = parse_json(remediation_history)
| extend remediation_history_instant_rescan_details = tostring(json_remediation_history.instant_rescan_details), remediation_history_last_refresh_reason_code = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_refresh_reason_code), remediation_history_last_refresh_requester = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_refresh_requester), remediation_history_last_refresh_status_date = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_refresh_status_date), remediation_history_last_refresh_status_label = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_refresh_status_label), remediation_history_last_refresh_status_reason = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_refresh_status_reason), remediation_history_last_requested_refresh_date = tostring(json_remediation_history.last_requested_refresh_date), remediation_history_result_finding_date = tostring(json_remediation_history.result_finding_date)
| project-away json_remediation_history, remediation_history

resources.name: [guid(resourceGroup().id, concat('Non Statistics DCR Role assignment', variables('FunctionName')))]
